oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Striking Policemen Break Up Robbery and Rape at Cafe"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: 1978 Police and Fire strike; strikes; Memphis Police Department; crime;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Three Memphis police officers stopped a robbery and rape at a North Memphis cafe while on strike. Officers were identified as Kenneth Rooker, Tommy Beach and Henry Todd.
